name: Queen of Spades
description: Since ancient times, it is believed that any mirror can become a portal to the world dead. One of the oldest rituals with a mirror is the rite of the call of the Queen of Spades.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
